body_html:
@MlWoo will the RNG be consistent across CPUs, i.e. will it give consistent results on a CPU with AVX and CPU without AVX and CPU with AVX2, etc.?
I think relaxing MKL requirement is a bit more feasible and I am willing to make that trade-off, because we give binaries to our users with MKL.
However, if it's not consistent to expect that different CPU features are generating different RNG.
